headlines.description: Manchester United continued their improved start to the Premier League season with a 1-0 win over Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fernandes strikes as Man United defeat Saints

headlines.description: Vitaly Janelt hooked in an 84th-minute equaliser to earn Brentford a 1-1 home Premier League draw against Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford snatch late equaliser to draw 1-1 with Everton

events.name: Leeds United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion kept up their impressive unbeaten start to the Premier League season on Saturday with a 1-0 win against Leeds.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gross strikes as Brighton beat Leeds 1-0

headlines.description: Raheem Sterling scored his first goals for Chelsea since signing from Manchester City this summer, as Chelsea beat Leicester City 2-1 on Saturday.
Liverpool ended their wait for a win in the Premier League this season in emphatic style, routing Bournemouth with a 9-0 win at Anfield on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool win 9-0 to match PL record victory

headlines.description: Erling Haaland scored a hat trick as Manchester City fought back from two goals down to beat Crystal Palace 4-2 at the Etihad on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haaland hat trick leads City to comeback victory

headlines.description: Arsenal continued their flawless start to the Premier League on Saturday as they rallied to a 2-1 win against Fulham at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal rally to continue flawless PL start
